title: I'm giving Kled his stereotype
body:
So, here is some stuff the community could work with-
-Kled is a tsundere (If you pay attention to his Voice lines, he sometimes doesn't want Skaarl to leave, and he is violent to him when others are looking)
-He is high on Teemo Shrooms
-He frequents Taco Bell
There ya go

replies.body:
He also sounds like a drill sergeant, gentleman, we have our noxian drill sergeant
http://memecrunch.com/meme/QR82/finally/image.png

But not a support

:-(
SAYS YOU! I'LL MAKE IT WORK DAMMIT!

...

Vayne and Kled bot lane... They're either gonna feed or hard carry...

And it will be epic

http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5wcd7dMry1rul0hko1_250.gif
Dam it rito
Yandere's are the ones who don't want their partner to leave and will violently chase

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-26T18:43:25.590+0000)
>
> Yandere's are the ones who don't want their partner to leave and will violently chase

he isnt chasing skaarl himself

Not unless you make him 

:-P

Also, he loves trucker hats:

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OeZXr6WFRo4

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-26T21:08:07.883+0000)
>
> Also, he loves trucker hats:
> 
>  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OeZXr6WFRo4

wut

It's from an abridged version of Dragon ball Z:

 https://youtu.be/BZiPJk6eR9A?t=9s

I'm pretty much saying he needs a skin with a trucker hat :p
In an ARAM i discussed the fact that it sounds like he owns slaves. And owns a friend chicken joint. Kled's Chicken Plantation was born.

But guys. The first line we hear Kled say

"You're Trespassing" And he is in a desert area riding a derp mount. His accent as well!

He is obviously a Redneck hillbilly Hick.

Hell, one of his abilities is called VIOLENT TENDENCIES

> [{quoted}](name=Dicerson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-07-26T22:55:49.610+0000)
>
> But guys. The first line we hear Kled say
> 
> "You're Trespassing" And he is in a desert area riding a derp mount. His accent as well!
> 
> He is obviously a Redneck hillbilly Hick.
> 
> Hell, one of his abilities is called VIOLENT TENDENCIES

Not all Redneck Hillbilly Hicks are psychopaths so you know, I would know because I live in the South. >.> That's just something with Kled.

> [{quoted}](name=Ryzing2Diamond,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-07-27T02:15:04.896+0000)
>
> Not all Redneck Hillbilly Hicks are psychopaths so you know, I would know because I live in the South. >.> That's just something with Kled.

Violent tendencies are some of the defining characteristics of the hick, alongside racism and stupidity. I believe you are merely dealing with redneck hillbillies, not hick-varieties.

> [{quoted}](name=PelicanOfDeath,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-07-27T02:23:38.559+0000)
>
> Violent tendencies are some of the defining characteristics of the hick, alongside racism and stupidity. I believe you are merely dealing with redneck hillbillies, not hick-varieties.

What you just said is pretty discriminatory in itself. You're stereotyping a group of people as if it is fact.

> [{quoted}](name=Ryzing2Diamond,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-27T02:27:33.077+0000)
>
> What you just said is pretty discriminatory in itself. You're stereotyping a group of people as if it is fact.

That is the definition of a word. Hick means: One who is violently defensive of his homeland. Often discriminatory towards other ethnicities, and are often of lower intelligence than their peers.
-Webster's Dictionary 1932

I literally put the definition of the bloody word. That's what hick means. If your allied rednecks use the term to describe themselves then they're using it wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Ryzing2Diamond,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zcQII2sv,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-07-27T02:15:04.896+0000)
>
> Not all Redneck Hillbilly Hicks are psychopaths so you know, I would know because I live in the South. >.> That's just something with Kled.

I do too.

But we're talking stereotypes here. Look at the title of the thread :P
You forgot his new stereotype that hes a champion from Louisiana and Mississippi just like {{champion:223}}
kled doesn't have any dere.
